name: bluesky_scrape_followers
description: Scrape followers list from a Bluesky profile. Returns follower names, handles, bios, and avatar URLs.

steps.code: const followers = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="listItemMyProfileCard"], [class*="ProfileCard"], [class*="follower-item"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 30); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="displayName"], [data-testid="profileHeaderDisplayName"]'); const handleEl = el.querySelector('[class*="handle"]'); const bioEl = el.querySelector('[class*="description"], [class*="bio"]'); const avatarEl = el.querySelector('[data-testid="userAvatarImage"], img'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/profile/"]'); followers.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', handle: handleEl ? handleEl.textContent.trim() : '', bio: bioEl ? bioEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '', avatar: avatarEl ? avatarEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { handle: '{{handle}}', follower_count: followers.length, followers: followers, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: followers_data
steps.label: Extract followers
